name: Outlook Task File
summary: Learn about .OLK14TASK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: OLK14TASK files are saved automatically by the software when a new task is created. They are not manually opened or saved by the user since the software interface provides access to the tasks.

description: File used by Microsoft Outlook for Mac, a calendar and email application that replaced Microsoft Entourage; contains a task, or "to-do," that was created in the program; used for marking messages that are flagged for follow up.
